game.name: Six Sides of the World
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Six Sides of the World is a puzzle videogame that takes you into an intergalactic journey through different star systems riddled with brain-racking challenges.Spatial orientation, logic and pure wit will be your weapons to go through the different cube shaped planetary systems.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Six Sides of the World is a puzzle videogame that takes you into an intergalactic journey through different star systems riddled with brain-racking challenges.Spatial orientation, logic and pure wit will be your weapons to go through the different cube shaped planetary systems.

reviewHighlights.text: 군더더기 없는 간단한 조작의 퍼즐게임. 과하게 칭찬할 요소도 없기는 하지만 그만큼 무난하게 즐길만한 퍼즐게임인듯. 퍼즐 좋아하시면 가격도 무난하고 괜찮은거 같습니다.
꼬마 비행기가 한국에서 아르헨티나,우루과이가는 줄.. 하아아아암...BGM도 좋고 꾸르잠! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡° )
